notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: JdVM, LJdV, WSC and MAAL designed the study protocol. JML, MAAL, CPR, IPT performed the PCR. JdVM, LJdV, WSC and MAAL: responsible for obtaining funding and laboratory work supervision. ISR, WSC, HCN was responsible for the clinical assessment, samples collection and database completion. JdVM and LJdV drafted the manuscript. All authors critically revised the manuscript for intellectual content. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
